answerText: The Underdogs [or Los de abajo][10] Mariano Azuela, the author of The Underdogs, preceded this other Mexican author of Christopher Unborn and Where the Air is Clear.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 13 - Finals 1 | 4 | Literature | World | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: Camila is in love with Luis Cervantes in this novel, but she becomes the protagonists lover before getting stabbed. For 10 points each: [10] Identify this novel about Demetrio Macias, a leader of a band of militiamen during the Mexican Revolution.
